@Weibs wrote:

Oh ya just incase you were wondering, make sure you set the client, then start the script, then position your mouse wherever you want it to click, and then press F9.

-Weibs.

item.title: Need a scar for king of buttons
item.dc:creator: @Weibs Weibs
item.description:
@Weibs wrote:

Ok, well, if you need a script that will click over and over again wherever you position the mouse, here ya go :).

[code]Program KOB2;

Const
ClicksToDo = 1000; //Number of clicks to do.
WaitTime = 100; //Amount of time (In Milleseconds) inbetween clicks.

Procedure WaitForStart;
Begin
Repeat
Wait(100);
Until(IsFKeyDown(9));
End;

Procedure StartClicking;
Var
x, y, Clicks: Integer;

Begin
Clicks:=0;
Wait(1000);
GetMousePos(x, y);
Repeat
ClickMouse(x, y, true);
Wait(WaitTime);
Clicks:=Clicks+1;
Until(Clicks=ClicksToDo);
End;

Begin
ActivateClient;
WaitForStart;
WriteLn(‘Now clicking on specifed location.’);
StartClicking;
WriteLn(‘Done clicking!’);
End.[/code]

I hope this is what you were looking for, :). If you need anything else, just ask.

-Weibs.

Read full topic
